name: Summarize YouTube Video
objective: Quickly understand key points of a YouTube video without watching the entire content using AI summarization
description: A fast workflow for extracting key insights from YouTube videos using Google AI Studio's built-in video analysis capabilities. Simply paste a URL and get structured summaries in bullet points within seconds.
time_saved: Eliminates need to watch entire video (can save 10-60 minutes per video)

tasks.task_name: Access Google AI Studio Chat tab
tasks.description: Open Google AI Studio and navigate to the Chat interface
Insert the target YouTube video URL into the prompt field
Prompt: 'Summarize this video in 5 bullet points' or specify custom format
Read AI-generated summary and extract key insights for use

objects_created.description: Structured bullet-point summary of YouTube video content

entry_criteria: Clear understanding of what information is needed from the video
exit_criteria: No need to watch full video for required information
typical_inputs: Desired summary format (bullet points, paragraph, etc.)
Number of key points to extract
Specific focus areas (technical details, business insights, etc.)
best_practices: Specify exact number of bullet points for consistent output
Request focus on specific topics if video is long or covers multiple subjects
Use for videos 5+ minutes long where watching full content isn't necessary
Review summary for accuracy if critical decisions depend on it
Combine with timestamp requests for deeper dive into specific sections
common_pitfalls: Using with very short videos where watching is faster
Not specifying summary format, resulting in overly detailed output
Assuming 100% accuracy without verification for critical information
Not providing context about what specific information is needed
integration_with_other_workflows: WRF-021: Can extract video insights to inform social media caption creation
Content research workflows for blog posts or articles

video_source.video_title: Google AI Studio Full Walkthrough and Tutorial
video_source.creator: AI for Grownups
